title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy S22+/Ultra $200 off, Fossil Gen 6 Wear OS Smartwatch $229, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by new all-time lows on Samsung’s Galaxy S22 series smartphones at $200 off. That’s alongside Fossil’s latest Gen 6 Wear OS Smartwatch at $229 and the Assistant-enabled Kasa Motion Dimmer Switch for $30. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy S22+/Ultra $200 off, Fossil Gen 6 Wear OS Smartwatch $229, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung's unlocked Galaxy S22 series smartphones are now down to all-time lows with the flagship Ultra model at $200 off.
